verses.text: \w Put|strong="G5279"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* in \w mind|strong="G5279"\w* to be subject \w to|strong="G5293"\w* \w principalities|strong="G0746"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w powers|strong="G1849"\w*, to obey \w magistrates|strong="G3980"\w*, to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w ready|strong="G2092"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*,

To speak evil \w of|strong="G0987"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w*, to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* no \w brawlers|strong="G0269"\w*, \add but\add* \w gentle|strong="G1933"\w*, \w shewing|strong="G1731"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w meekness|strong="G4236"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w ourselves|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w sometimes|strong="G4218"\w* \w foolish|strong="G0453"\w*, \w disobedient|strong="G0545"\w*, \w deceived|strong="G4105"\w*, \w serving|strong="G1398"\w* \w divers|strong="G4164"\w* \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w pleasures|strong="G2237"\w*, \w living|strong="G1236"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w malice|strong="G2549"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w envy|strong="G5355"\w*, \w hateful|strong="G4767"\w*, \add and\add* \w hating|strong="G3404"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* after \w that|strong="G3753"\w* the \w kindness|strong="G5544"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w love|strong="G5363"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w* toward \w man|strong="G5363"\w* \w appeared|strong="G2014"\w*,

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* have \w done|strong="G4160"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w* he \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w washing|strong="G3067"\w* of \w regeneration|strong="G3824"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w renewing|strong="G0342"\w* of the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*;

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w shed|strong="G1632"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w abundantly|strong="G4146"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w*;

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* being \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* by \w his|strong="G1565"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, we should be \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w heirs|strong="G2818"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* of \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\add This is\add* a \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* these \w things|strong="G5130"\w* I \w will|strong="G1014"\w* \w that|strong="G1226"\w* \w thou|strong="G4571"\w* affirm \w constantly|strong="G1226"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they which have \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* in \w God|strong="G2316"\w* might be \w careful|strong="G5431"\w* to \w maintain|strong="G4291"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*. These \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w profitable|strong="G5624"\w* unto \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w avoid|strong="G4026"\w* \w foolish|strong="G3474"\w* \w questions|strong="G2214"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w genealogies|strong="G1076"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w contentions|strong="G2054"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strivings|strong="G3163"\w* about the \w law|strong="G3544"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w unprofitable|strong="G0512"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w vain|strong="G3152"\w*.

A \w man|strong="G0444"\w* that is an \w heretick|strong="G0141"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* the \w first|strong="G1520"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w admonition|strong="G3559"\w* \w reject|strong="G3868"\w*;

\w Knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he that is \w such|strong="G5108"\w* is \w subverted|strong="G1612"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sinneth|strong="G0264"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* condemned of \w himself|strong="G0843"\w*.

\w When|strong="G3752"\w* I shall \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w Artemas|strong="G0734"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w Tychicus|strong="G5190"\w*, be \w diligent|strong="G4704"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Nicopolis|strong="G3533"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I have \w determined|strong="G2919"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* to \w winter|strong="G3914"\w*.

\w Bring|strong="G4311"\w* \w Zenas|strong="G2211"\w* the \w lawyer|strong="G3544"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Apollos|strong="G0625"\w* on their \w journey|strong="G4311"\w* \w diligently|strong="G4709"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* be \w wanting|strong="G3007"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w let|strong="G3129"\w* \w ours|strong="G2251"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w learn|strong="G3129"\w* to \w maintain|strong="G4291"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w necessary|strong="G0316"\w* \w uses|strong="G5532"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w unfruitful|strong="G0175"\w*.

All that \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w* \w salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*. \w Greet|strong="G0782"\w* them that \w love|strong="G5368"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*. \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*. It was written to Titus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Cretians, from Nicopolis of Macedonia.
